## retrieve() function

Retrieves documents from a [RetrieverAction](./ai.retrieveraction.md) based on the provided query.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function retrieve<CustomOptions extends z.ZodTypeAny>(params: RetrieverParams<CustomOptions>): Promise<Array<Document>>;
```
